comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Impressive colour.  I wonder what process produced the colouring.  Maybe it's hand coloured.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
It looks to be hand coloured but it may have be done using another process - we'll check it out and let you know.

UPDATE  - our conservator checked the original and it is definitely hand-tinted.
